cause.description:
We want the public to know the lies behind diamond trading. The withholding of diamonds to create high demand while countries in Africa suffer because of this. We want to tell the public how important it is to make sure a diamond they buy is conflict free. We want to stop blood diamonds and support the recovery of African countries.
1. Justice is an international right
cause.mission: Let the public know of the deceit behind diamond trading and prevent the sales of conflict diamonds
cause.name: Conflict Diamond Awareness and Prevention
